about.title: A little about me
about.line1: Hi, I'm a freelance web developer specializing in localization web solutions for international small-medium businesses.
about.line2: I have experience building enterprise-grade web applications at JP Morgan, one of the world's largest banks, and a degree in software development for business (in progress).
about.line3: As the world globalizes, many businesses don't take advantage of emerging markets. I specialize in helping Japanese businesses reach a more international market and vis versa.
about.line4: Through my services, I can build your business a professional internationalized modern web application to accomplish anything online, reach new markets and grow your business.
about.outOfJapan: Due to current coronavirus situation I am currently not in Japan but am still available to work online. Currently planning to move to Japan in 2022.

i18n.title: What is Internationalization?
i18n.explanation1: Internationalization is software designed around the international world we live in. Internationalized websites can be easily localized to multiple locales.
i18n.explanation2: Localization is the process of adapting to a region or language, this involves translation as well as other UI changes to accommodate users from different cultures.
i18n.explanation3: Internationalization provides the best experience to all users. This is important, both businesses entering foreign markets as well as supporting a growing mixed English population domestically.

1.title: Internationalization
1.desc: Automatically redirect and change languages in seconds dynamically. Helping bring your business to new international markets.
